section.title: Placing an Order Below $100.00
section.para: This procedure describes how to to place and confirm an order for less than $100.00, and specify the delivery date and time.
Ensure Twinkle is correctly configured (), and idle, before proceeding.

step.para: Log onto the portal using the previously configured customer account in
Click the Shop tab, or Start Shopping, to display the Furniture Search screen.

step.title: Select Item
step.para: The "Mission Natural Coffee Table", with a value of $75.76, is added to the Shopping Cart.

step.title: Checkout
step.para: The Shopping Cart screen is displayed.
Click Checkout, and then click Confirm.
At this point, the server dials the SIP Number specified in the user account.

step.title: Confirm the Order
step.para: Answer the incoming call and, when prompted, press 1 to confirm the order.
Once the order is confirmed, the server will terminate the call. After terminating the confirmation call, the user will received a second call to confirm the delivery date and time.

note.para: If 2 is pressed, the order is cancelled. The user will receive no further calls from the server.

step.title: Confirm the Delivery Date and Time
step.para: Answer the second incoming call and, when prompted, enter the date and time according to the format required by the server.

note.para: The format required for the date and time is ddmmyyhhmm. For example, if the preferred delivery date and time is 7th December 2009 at 1pm, the number sequence required is 0712091300.

step.para: Once the date and time has been correctly entered, the server will confirm the date and time entered and terminate the call.
